Naxxramas.name: Avenge
Naxxramas.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
Naxxramas.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Undertaker
Naxxramas.text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1/+1.
Naxxramas.flavor: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Webspinner
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
Naxxramas.flavor: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Zombie Chow
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Restore #5 Health to the enemy hero.
Naxxramas.flavor: Zombie.  It's what's for dinner.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Echoing Ooze
Naxxramas.text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
Naxxramas.flavor: OOZE... Ooze... Ooze... (ooze...)
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Haunted Creeper
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spectral Spiders.
Naxxramas.flavor: Arachnofauxbia: Fear of fake spiders.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Mad Scientist
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Naxxramas.flavor: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Nerub'ar Weblord
Naxxramas.text: Minions with Battlecry cost (2) more.
Naxxramas.flavor: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Nerubian Egg
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
Naxxramas.flavor: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Reincarnate
Naxxramas.text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
Naxxramas.flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Unstable Ghoul
Naxxramas.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
Naxxramas.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Dancing Swords
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws a card.
Naxxramas.flavor: They like to dance to reggae.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Dark Cultist
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
Naxxramas.flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Deathlord
Naxxramas.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Your opponent puts a minion from their deck into the battlefield.
Naxxramas.flavor: "Rise from your grave!" - Kel'Thuzad
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Duplicate
Naxxramas.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
Naxxramas.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Shade of Naxxramas
Naxxramas.text: Stealth. At the start of your turn, gain +1/+1.
Naxxramas.flavor: I would've thought the giant, floating necropolis that is Naxxramas would cast a bigger shadow.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Stoneskin Gargoyle
Naxxramas.text: At the start of your turn, restore this minion to full Health.
Naxxramas.flavor: Stoneskin Gargoyles love freeze tag.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
Naxxramas.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Baron Rivendare
Naxxramas.text: Your minions trigger their Deathrattles twice.
Naxxramas.flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Death's Bite
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
Naxxramas.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Poison Seeds
Naxxramas.text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
Naxxramas.flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Voidcaller
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
Naxxramas.flavor: "Void!  Here, void!  Here, buddy!"
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Wailing Soul
Naxxramas.text: Battlecry: Silence your other minions.
Naxxramas.flavor: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Feugen
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: If Stalagg also died this game, summon Thaddius.
Naxxramas.flavor: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Loatheb
Naxxramas.text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
Naxxramas.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 30 Curse of Naxxramas cards.

Naxxramas.name: Sludge Belcher
Naxxramas.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Slime with Taunt.
Naxxramas.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Spectral Knight
Naxxramas.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Naxxramas.flavor: What do Faerie Dragons and Spectral Knights have in common?  They both love pasta!
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Stalagg
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: If Feugen also died this game, summon Thaddius.
Naxxramas.flavor: Stalagg want to write own flavor text.  "STALAGG AWESOME!"
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Maexxna
Naxxramas.text: Poisonous
Naxxramas.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Kel'Thuzad
Naxxramas.text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
Naxxramas.flavor: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
